name: Labyrinth Proof of Concept
description:
Explore the Labyrinth and defeat the final boss to win!

Controls:

       w,a,s,d   or   arrows: move

       space: attack

       left shift: dash

       e: choose ability

       q: use ability

       p: pause

       esc: leave fullscreen

      mouse: click to select options in main & pause menus.

       *Additionally, you can play with a plugged in gamepad.

Thanks for checking out our proof of concept! The game called "Confronting Morality" is the game that ParrTay is spending its time making. This proof of concept shows off a small piece of what one of the Labyrinths in the game may look like.

Created by Michael Parr, Kendall Bowles, Ben Ott, Justin Bonner, Allen Nguyen, and Aaron Nordhoff. With help from Tay Lipson  and Sean Parr.
